parameters.workflowData: ={{ { task: 'Extract key concepts and topics from this note for finding related notes', input: $json.note_content, reasoning_steps: ['1. Identify main topic and theme', '2. Extract key concepts and entities', '3. Identify related fields and subtopics', '4. Generate search keywords for finding similar notes'], output_format: { main_topic: 'string', key_concepts: ['array of concepts'], related_fields: ['array of fields'], search_keywords: ['array of keywords'] } } }}

={{ { query: $json.reasoning_output.search_keywords.join(' '), collection: 'notes', limit: $('process-input').item.json.max_links * 2, threshold: $('process-input').item.json.threshold, filter: { user_id: $('process-input').item.json.user_id, exclude_id: $('process-input').item.json.note_id }, rerank: true } }}

parameters.query:
=INSERT INTO note_links (source_note_id, target_note_id, user_id, link_reason, relevance_score, shared_concepts, created_at)
SELECT 
  $1 as source_note_id,
  unnest($2::text[]) as target_note_id,
  $3 as user_id,
  unnest($4::text[]) as link_reason,
  unnest($5::float[]) as relevance_score,
  unnest($6::jsonb[]) as shared_concepts,
  $7 as created_at
ON CONFLICT (source_note_id, target_note_id) 
DO UPDATE SET 
  link_reason = EXCLUDED.link_reason,
  relevance_score = EXCLUDED.relevance_score,
  shared_concepts = EXCLUDED.shared_concepts,
  updated_at = EXCLUDED.created_at
RETURNING *;

options.queryParams: ={{ $('process-input').item.json.note_id }}, {{ JSON.parse($json.response || '{}').linked_notes.map(n => n.note_id) }}, {{ $('process-input').item.json.user_id }}, {{ JSON.parse($json.response || '{}').linked_notes.map(n => n.link_reason) }}, {{ JSON.parse($json.response || '{}').linked_notes.map(n => n.relevance_score) }}, {{ JSON.parse($json.response || '{}').linked_notes.map(n => JSON.stringify(n.shared_concepts)) }}, {{ $('process-input').item.json.timestamp }}
